name: Veins
description:
Duel your friends or help each other complete tasks in different game modes! Keep the adrenaline pumping as you pull yourself around at high speeds, crashing in to objects and friends alike. Just make sure your heart doesn't stop!



Features
  • 2 - 4 players, local or online
  • Several different game modes, both co-op and vs.
  • Physics-based chaos
  • Beautiful locations that you will definitely improve upon!
  • Blood (and friendship!)
  • Multiple playable "characters" to choose from


Development
The game is in really early development. Make sure to follow us on the social things in order to get info about the development things. Yes.
